The Khedive of Egypt, Isma'il I commissioned an expedition to explore the Equatoria region south of the Sudan, and to organize a new Egyptian province there. A British explorer and engineer named Samuel White Baker who had led an expedition down the Nile in 1865 was contracted by the Khedive to lead the Egyptian forces and to be the first Governor-General of the new territory..
An expansionist Khedive, Isma'il I moved to incorporate the territory of Darfur into the Egyptian Sudan in 1874.
Non-Accepted Bureaucrats Fix Cooldown is 10 years.
Our regional rivals are promoting pan-Italian nationalism in an attempt to legitimize the conquest of their neighbors! We must form a counter bloc to stop their clearly expansionist policy.
The Italian peninsula has been united! No longer will pretender elements exist within Italy.
We have crushed our pathetic rival's attempt at unifying the Italian peninsula under their guise of nationalism. Now we must unite the Italian peninsula under OUR guise of nationalism!

The Italian Irredentist movement strove for the transfer to the Kingdom of Italy of all territories in the immediate vicinity of the Kingdom which were largely or partly seen as populated by ethnic Italians. Not only did this include claims to Austrian lands in Italy proper, but it also meant territorial ambitions further into Dalmatia, and Austria.

The Adriatic Sea, a region that is historically Italian, is within our grasp and many Italians live in the lands around it to this day. It's time to assert our hegemony on the territory around it, safeguarding the Italians that still live there.
If Australia is AI for the first year of the game, you may annex it automatically with this decision. DO NOT WAIT.
If South Africa is AI for the first year of the game, you may annex it automatically with this decision. DO NOT WAIT.
If Canada is AI for the first year of the game, you may annex it automatically with this decision. DO NOT WAIT.
This event converts all non-core/non-accepted craftsmen on your cores into artisans.
China and Japan specific decision that protects you until 1865 from acquire land CBs, but also blocks you from building them.USE AT YOUR OWN DISCRETION.
China and Japan specific decision that turns off your protection from acquire land CBs, that you otherwise would have until 1865. USE AT YOUR OWN DISCRETION.

This decision is intended to salvage your country after it has been craftsmen hijacked. It will revert all non-core/non-accepted craftsmen on your cores to artisans so that your core craftsmen will start working. (Think South Germans in Venetia hijacking.) BECAREFUL OF USE.
This decision is intended to convert non-accepted Bureaucrats into Artisans, in both states and colonies, so they stop getting fat off of state admin funding.
Ask The British Empire for Support
The world's oceans are big enough for the two of us, surely the British Empire will understand then that we require her resources to prosper in our time of need. (Decision only available in 1836)
Ask the United States for Support

Clearly we cannot trust other interests in Asia, but we can't fuel this machine on good will. There appears to be a budding nation across the Pacific... they may be able to provide us with markets in our time of need. (Decision only available in 1836)
If our interests are in China, then surely allying ourselves with the next best thing to overcome her would be the right course of action. (Decision only available in 1836)
Automatically allies all player nations. DO NOT SPAM.
Enables total annexation CBs for players in the game. (Requires no building)
Disables the safety on enabling Total Annexation CBs.
This decision removes the old CSA cores to help prevent a weird rebel issue that occurs because of core changes for the assimilation rework.
The time to unite the Andean peoples is upon us! We must create a vanguard nation state to call all Andeans home. Long live Peru-Bolivia!
This decision removes AI nations from immigration priority entirely. Immigrants will only go to player nations.
During this time period, there were land reforms in Mexico very similar to the United States Homestead Act.

The Major Powers chaffing at our periphery is inclining us to attempt projecting into the steppe, but who could possibly own such a vast region with land ownership? The real value is the people themselves.
For too long have the peoples of the Balkans thwarted our efforts of expansion. Let us focus all our attention to the re-education and assimilation of these barbaric peoples.
Force China to concede core territory.

In the Victorian era tanneries were often close to the abattoirs and so the skins would often arrive at the tannery fresh and unsalted. With industrial levels of meat consumption, it was inevitable that the leather industry advance as well.
Our country political reforms match every liberal demand, giving us international recognition as a truly free state.
Through our domination of the isles we can now unify the celts. Our potential is now no longer bound to these islands and various paths to greatness have opened up for us

To watch the heart of a once great empire fall brings great anguish to many, but fortunately the ostrogoths have proven themselves to be weak.

Our nation has not only survived, but have established ourselves as the dominant power of North Africa
We now have the power to reunite the pieces of the Western Roman Empire and to become a great and powerful Gothic Empire.

Our domination over the Eastern Europe is complete, and the time has come to declare a single states of all the Slavs. The Great Bear has finally risen, and now Europe shall fear us!
Our position amongst the South Slavic nations have permitted us to establish a new federation and be one step closer in uniting all slavs!
No longer shall we be isolated tribes that squabble amongst ourselves for the benefit of foreign empires, but instead a new united nation that could threaten even Rome itself
Italy has shown its weakness to us and we must establish a proper homeland for our people.
The Ostrogoths have been cleared out and our migration is now complete

Organize the Republic of the Rio Grande
The Battle at Camlann has resulted in our King, Arthur, dying while trying to keep the Angles off of Britiain. Our military is reinvigorated and wont stop until we push the Angles out to the sea!

Ever since the reign of Aurelian, Germanic tribes migrated into the old Roman province of Noricum. For centuries, our brothers toiled under the crumbling empire. Now, with the empire ever a distant memory, and the acendency of a united Germania, we've conquered the defunct province. It's time to integrate the lands as a true part of Magna Germania.

In the wake of Attila's rampage across europe, Slavic tribes move ever westwards onto the old lands of Magna Germania, displacing our people and replacing them with their own. After a number of victories against the Slavs, we've secured these lands once more, never to lose them again.

The Frankish lands on the eastern bank of the Rhine always presented a threat to the free peoples of Germania. Now, like Herman of old, we've pushed the Romanophile Franks back across the Rhine for good!

The Squabbling tribes and vast lands of the far north are finally united under a single banner. No more will unwashed nomads and southern invaders push us into submission. The North shall descend onto Eurasia, and the world will tremble in our wake.

The food output from Egypt has always been a valuable part of our Empire and the crucial border region of the levant. We should integrate their people into our Kingdom if we seek to hold off Persia.

§RIf you select this you are locked out of Roman Expansion

For centuries we have fought with Persia for influence over Armenia. Not only that, but the Armenians are also an important minority that we have on our Persian Border. To maintain national security we need to integrate their people. 

§RIf you select this you are locked out of Roman Expansion

Our religious unity is being threatened by the schisms between Chalcedonians, those who believe Jesus Christ has 2 natures divine and human, and Monophysites, who believe Jesus Christ has only a single divine will. The Lakhmids and Ghassinids are on the verge of breaking away from both the church and our influence. In order to preserve Christendom, we need to hold an ecumenical council to reconcile these beliefs
Army ready for war against Italy
Our King has died fighting the Angles! We must avenge him!
The Bretons are a closely related people that belong to our kingdom!
Though recent events to the Hagia Sophia have been tragic, we can rebuild it.
Through our subjugation and conquering we have secured the Steppes. To counter anyone from undoing our conquests, we need to unify into a nation.

Through diplomacy and conflict, we've emerged as the sole rulers of the Gangetic plain and Indus Valley, the two cornerstones of Indian civilizaion. With foreign powers ever encoraching on our subcontinent, now more than ever we must stand united, and perhaps forge a world empire of our own.
Our nomadic army tradition has many benefits

We hereby declare that we will no longer support this heretic nonsense within our empire
Through our assortment of knights of great renown we will beat the Angles!
Our great leader has united the disperate Malay tribes into a single state, one that will not only keep us safe from foreign empires, but allow us to rule the waves ourselves!

After centuries of fighting, we've chased the Romans out of the fertile cresent. Our influence now spreads to every great sea, and we have the strengh to declare ourselves the hegemon of the classical world!
From our liberation of Babylon, the people of the Fertile Cresent have prospered under our rule, it's time we fully integrate these people into our empire

For thousands of years, invader after invader stormed through the Hindu Kush, to rampage across the Indus Valley and Gangetic Plain. Us, the natives of the sub-continent, retreated into the Deccan and behind the Ghats. But now, the invaders come from across the sea. We must unite once and for all or see the last of our people extinguished!
Our long rivalry has ended. Now we can abandon these pointless wars within and begin to project ourselves outward.
Cropfailures and famine have led to increasing social unrest. Many in this time demand reform or outright leave in search of a better place.

The dust in Rome has settled... Once a bustling metropolis, she met her demise at the hands of numerous barbarian incursions until Odoacer, king of Italy, overthrew the last Rome emperor in the west, shattering the ancient empire into a thousand pieces. While the glory of Rome still burns in the orient, Rome as a concept has been split asunder. In China, the Northern Wei have unified the numerous fiefdoms of the northern frontier, and much like their predecessors in the Liu Song, tension reigns through the court of the Southern Qi fearing another brother jealous of the celestial-throne. Meanwhile in Iran, Kavadh I has just regained his throne after bribing the Hephthalites to help him depose his younger brother.  And now, far, far away, across the briny foam, the riches of Atlantia, Australia, and Africa beckon that their shouts may be heard in the Colosseum of Europe. Drivers, ready your chariot, for the 6th century has begun.
The world's first true plague pandemic now exasperated by increased trade from the Industrial Revolution.
The Hagia Sophia stands as a mark of our splendor and prestigeous national architecture

Migration of peoples is still largely restricted, but elites, professionals and exiles who may provide service to our country are allowed in. §YThis will halt all migration unless you have either a new world nation flag or pass the majority of political and social reforms §W.
The Pannonian Frontier has long been a region of instabilty. We need to fortify our control over illyria to maintain order of our borders.
If we ever seek to unite the Slavs, we must first consolidate power with the south Slavs
Although it has been many years since we had true control over Rome proper, the people have not grown too far apart from us.
The Vandals have been dealt with and we can now bring the population of Roman Africa back under our banner.
Divided we will wall fall victim to our neighbors, but united we can hope to prosper

Our quest towards the integration of Duetland has seen our state gaining the control of many territories in Alemmania. With our hold secured on these areas we can surely gain the approval and cooperation of the locals!

Our quest towards the integration of Duetland has seen our state gaining the control of many territories in Thrungia. With our hold secured on these areas we can surely gain the approval and cooperation of the locals!

Our quest towards the integration of Duetland has seen our state gaining the control of many territories in Saxonia. With our hold secured on these areas we can surely gain the approval and cooperation of the locals!
The Securing of the Alps can not be done without the help and support of the Raetian
If we seek to survive with the expansion of Rome and the Sassanid Empire it is necessary to form a unitary state with our leadership.
Our troubles with the Persians and our influental Christian class from Karelia have convinced the King and his court to consider following the path of the Christians
Our neighbor to our west, Persia, has reformed their Religion to allow and encourage conversions, in the interests of our regional security, we might consider the path of the Lord of Wisdom
Our troubles with the Persians and Christian missions from Rome have made following the path of the Christians an enticing one, our King and Court are considering hearing its message
Our neighbor to our south, Persia, has reformed their Religion to allow and encourage conversions, in the interests of our regional security, we might consider the path of the Lord of Wisdom
Progress in the name of the Emperor!

The makers of idols are all of them nothing, and their best beloved things shall not profit them. They are their witnesses, that they do not see, nor understand, that they may be ashamed. - Isaiah 44:9
Our Byzantine ally in countering the Persian menace have long asked for our conversion, and it would be most wise to comply.
With Persia and her millions of people that follow the teachings of Zoroastrianism near our border, our conversion would allow for the much needed greater cooperation and integration
